title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4107.4 - Leases
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4107.4 - Leases

State Regulations

The lessee of a horse shall file with the eligibility
paper of such horse a copy of the leasing arrangement that shall contain the
name of the horse, the name and address of the owner, the name and address of
the lessee, the stable name, if any, of either party and the terms of the
lease. Each lessor and lessee must obtain an owner's license from the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4107.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
